text: @marcorubio This is not about politics this is about Trump's incompetence which makes the coronavirus even scarier. He claims a vaccine is 'very close' it's 24 months away. He claimed flu had higher death rates than coronavirus that's not true. Pence is not a doctor and s/n be point man.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
